Finance
=======

Garbage Collection Information
------------------------------

Garbage bills can be paid at City Hall at the [Finance Department](https://myportisabel.com/Directory.aspx?DID=12) drop box. NOTICE: Garbage Collection increase [+ 0.040%] effective 2/1/2024. [See full proclamation.](https://myportisabel.com/DocumentCenter/View/788/01-09-2024-05Garbage-rates-increase)

**BRUSH COLLECTION SCHEDULE:**[2025 Brush Collection Schedule](https://myportisabel.com/DocumentCenter/View/850/Port-Isabel---Brush-Calendar-2025)

**UPDATE:**Monthly rates for garbage collection service and related services by the City, including the City’s billing and taxes, are as follows:

            Residential Account (1 Cart)…………………………  $31.40

            Commercial Accounts (2Carts)………………………  $50.02

The rates established herein shall take effect February 1, 2024. [See full proclamation:](https://myportisabel.com/DocumentCenter/View/788/01-09-2024-05Garbage-rates-increase)
